      • invokeXAPI

        public static YFCElement invokeXAPI(java.lang.String apiName,
                                    YFCElement input,
                                    YFCElement template,
                                    SCUIContext uiContext)
        This method invokes XAPI using APIManager. Any exception thrown during API call, will bubble up. Normally XMLExceptionWrapper is thrown during API calls. Hence this exception should be handled by the caller.
        Note: This method call should only come through via SCUIMashupHelper#invokeMashup(String, Object, SCUIContext) or SCUIMashupHelper#invokeMashup(String, String, Object, SCUIContext) methods; or some other place where transaction context is set on the SCUIContext before calling this method.
        This method defaults ignoreException and rollBackModeOnly to false. If you want to set these attributes also use #invokeXAPI(String, YFCElement, YFCElement, boolean, boolean, SCUIContext) . apiName Name of the API input Input to the API template Output template for API uiContext API output

      • invokeXAPI

        public static YFCElement invokeXAPI(java.lang.String apiName,
                                    YFCElement input,
                                    YFCElement template,
                                    boolean ignoreException,
                                    boolean rollBackModeOnly,
                                    SCUIContext uiContext)
        This method invokes XAPI using APIManager. Any exception thrown during API call, will bubble up. Normally XMLExceptionWrapper is thrown during API calls. Hence this exception should be handled by the caller.
        If passed ignoreException is set to true, all XMLExceptionWrapper exceptions will be caught and null object will be returned as output.
        Note: This method call should only come through via SCUIMashupHelper#invokeMashup(String, Object, SCUIContext) or SCUIMashupHelper#invokeMashup(String, String, Object, SCUIContext) methods; or some other place where transaction context is set on the SCUIContext before calling this method. apiName Name of the API input Input to the API template Output template for API ignoreException If this flag is set to true, any APIManager.XMLExceptionWrapper exception thrown will be caught and null be returned as output. rollBackModeOnly Set this property to true, if API needs to be called in rollback mode uiContext API output

      • invokeXAPI

        public static YFCElement invokeXAPI(com.yantra.yfc.ui.backend.util.APICall apiCall,
                                    YFCElement input,
                                    SCUIContext uiContext)
        This method invokes XAPI using APIManager. Any exception thrown during API call, will bubble up. Normally XMLExceptionWrapper is thrown during API calls. Hence this exception should be handled by the caller.
        If passed apiCall is set to ignore exceptions, all XMLExceptionWrapper exceptions will be caught and null object will be returned as output.
        Note: This method call should only come through via SCUIMashupHelper#invokeMashup(String, Object, SCUIContext) or SCUIMashupHelper#invokeMashup(String, String, Object, SCUIContext) methods; or some other place where transaction context is set on the SCUIContext before calling this method. apiCall input uiContext API output

      • invokeXAPI

        public static YFCElement invokeXAPI(com.yantra.yfc.ui.backend.util.APICall apiCall,
                                    YFCElement input,
                                    SCUIContext uiContext,
                                    java.lang.String endpoint)
        This method invokes XAPI using APIManager. Any exception thrown during API call, will bubble up. Normally XMLExceptionWrapper is thrown during API calls. Hence this exception should be handled by the caller.
        If passed apiCall is set to ignore exceptions, all XMLExceptionWrapper exceptions will be caught and null object will be returned as output.

        Note: This method call should only come through via SCUIMashupHelper#invokeMashup(String, Object, SCUIContext) or SCUIMashupHelper#invokeMashup(String, String, Object, SCUIContext) methods; or some other place where transaction context is set on the SCUIContext before calling this method.

        Note: any data set as SCUIContext#getTransactionDataMap(), will be set to YFSEnvironment.Following sample code can be used to retrieve transactional data 

         if (yfsEnvironmentInstance instanceof ClientVersionSupport) {
                Map trqansactionDataMap = ((ClientVersionSupport) yfsEnvironmentInstance).getClientProperties();
        //Custom logic here
 }
        apiCall input Name of the API uiContext endpoint API output APICall

      • cleanupInput

        public static void cleanupInput(YFCElement inputElem)

      • isUrlInByPassList

        public static boolean isUrlInByPassList(SCUIContext uiContext)
        Checks if the url is in by pass list. These parameters can be used in web.xml:
        • bypass.uri.endswith - to allow static js,css or gif files this parameter can be used. As the name suggests, any url ending with value given will be bypassed.
        • bypass.uri.regex - to allow regex bypass. like in the example given below, the regex will allow any url which has ` 'stk' then '/' and then atleast one Capital Case character.
          <context-param> 
  <param-name>bypass.uri.endswith.stk.3</param-name>
        <param-value>.gif</param-value> 
  </context-param> 
  <context-param>
        <param-name>bypass.uri.regex.stk.1</param-name>
        <param-value>.*stk/[A-Z]+.*</param-value> 
  </context-param>
        uiContext true if URL is in bypass list

      • getErrorElement

        public static org.w3c.dom.Document getErrorElement(com.yantra.yfc.ui.backend.util.APIManager.XMLExceptionWrapper xapiEx,
                                                   SCUIContext uiContext)
        getErrorElement() gets the error xml in the form YFC XML Element and converts it into w3c element. If the user has permission to view the stack trace it is given otherwise removed. By default the xml from the exception has stack trace. xapiEx of the the type XMLExceptionWrapper uiContext of the type SCUIContext Document containing error.xml

      • getExceptionAsJson

        public static java.lang.String getExceptionAsJson(SCUIContext uiContext)
        This method gets a JSON response format for the exception in the request. If there is no exception in the request it returns a response with success as true. It also checks if the stacktrace permission is there if so returns the stack trace as String. uiContext of the type SCUIContext String containing the exception in Json response

      • getForwardURL

        public static java.lang.String getForwardURL(SCUIContext uiContext)
        Returns forward url for logged in user.
        FLOW: 
          If User is trying to login
    Check if referrer exists, 
  if yes, validate referrer and redirect
         Check if home page provider has been plugged in, 
  if so, call and redirect
         Check if a default home page parameter has been specified, 
  if so, redirect
  Default home.detail for backward compatibility purposes
        uiContext forward URL for logged in user.

      • isUserTryingToLogIn

        public static boolean isUserTryingToLogIn(SCUIContext uiContext,
                                          java.lang.String uiloginPage)
        checks if request URI is login URI i.e. if user is trying to login uiContext uiloginPage true if user is trying to login

      • isLoginPage

        public static boolean isLoginPage(SCUIContext uiContext)
        Checks if the request uri is a login page(not the page that is submitted when user logs in, but the actual login page). Checked only for a user that has done OIDC login, so that this page can be skipped. * uiContext

      • getLoginPage

        public static java.lang.String getLoginPage(SCUIContext uiContext)
        Gets the login page from the LoginPageProvider if given as Context parameter.
        If the LoginPageProvider is not given in the context parameter the login page is fetched directly from the context parameter.
        uiContext if of type SCUIContext login page

      • getHomePage

        public static java.lang.String getHomePage(SCUIContext uiContext)
        This method returns home page by calling HomePageProvider registered. If not found, it looks into context parameters for a parameter with name as SCUIConstants#LOGIN_DEFAULT_HOMEPAGE. uiContext home page

      • addCSRFToken

        public static java.lang.String addCSRFToken(java.lang.String uri,
                                            java.lang.String method,
                                            SCUIContext uiContext)
        This method determines whether CSRF token need to be added to the URI. If yes, current token is added to the URI. uri method uiContext URI with CSRF token added as a parameter

      • addAdditionalParams

        public static java.lang.String addAdditionalParams(java.lang.String uri,
                                                   java.lang.String method,
                                                   SCUIContext uiContext)
        This method adds additional required parameters on a URI. Like CSRF token, is guest user token etc. This method checks for an attribute in request with name SCUIImplConstants#SKIP_ADDING_ADDITIONAL_PARAMETERS. If this attribute is set to "Y", adding additional parameters is skipped. uri method uiContext URI with additional parameters added

      • isApplyWizardExtensions

        public static boolean isApplyWizardExtensions()
        This method returns a boolean based on whether wizard extensions should be applied or not. This property should only be used in dev mode. should extensions be applied on wizards in dev mode

      • setApplyWizardExtensions

        public static void setApplyWizardExtensions(boolean b)
        setter for property applyWizardpExtensions. This property determines whether wizard extensions should be applied or not. This property should only be used in dev mode. b

      • getEntityID

        public static java.lang.String getEntityID(java.lang.String objId,
                                           javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)

      • changeSession

        public static void changeSession(SCUIContext uiContext,
                                 boolean hasUserChanged)
                          throws SCUIException
        changeSession method for valid sessions, recreates a session after invalidating the old one. It notifies all the listeners added to SCUISessionChangeListener. The SCUISessionChangeData object that contains the session and local session attributes is used to populate the new session. uiContext of the type SCUIContext hasUserChanged is true if user has changed like from guest to actual user; otherwise false. SCUIException if the session or user is invalid or if there is a backend exception while creating context or user token or loading user data.
        Throws:
        SCUIException

      • changeSession

        public static void changeSession(SCUIContext uiContext,
                                 boolean hasUserChanged,
                                 boolean recreateSession)
                          throws SCUIException
        changeSession method for valid sessions, recreates a session after invalidating the old one based on the recreateSession parameter. It notifies all the listeners added to SCUISessionChangeListener. The SCUISessionChangeData object that contains the session and local session attributes is used to populate the new session. uiContext of the type SCUIContext hasUserChanged is true if user has changed like from guest to actual user; otherwise false. recreateSession if true session is invalidated and new one created; otherwise session attribute map and local session attribute map are cleared. SCUIException if the session or user is invalid or if there is a backend exception while creating context or user token or loading user data.
        Throws:
        SCUIException

      • restoreSession

        public static void restoreSession(SCUIContext uiContext,
                                  SCUISessionChangeData sessionData)
        This method fetches all the session and local session from SCUISessionChangeData and restores it in HttpSession. uiContext is of the type SCUIContext sessionData is of the type SCUISessionChangeData

      • login

        public static SCUISecurityResponse login(org.w3c.dom.Document loginDoc,
                                         SCUIContext uiContext)
        This method authenticates the current user and uses the passed document for user login. loginDoc the document to be used to login the user uiContext success or failed security response.
